Unnormalize Time–Intensity Data

Source: R/normalizationFunction_h0.R
unnormalizeData_h0.Rd

Reverses the transformation applied by normalizeData_h0, restoring raw time and intensity values from scaled data.

Usage

unnormalizeData_h0(dataInput)

Arguments

dataInput

A list as returned by normalizeData_h0, containing timeIntensityData and dataScalingParameters.

Value

A list with component:

timeIntensityData

data.frame of original time and intensity values.

Examples

norm <- normalizeData_h0(data.frame(time=0:10, intensity=rnorm(11)))
unnormalizeData_h0(norm)
#> $timeIntensityData
#>    time  intensity
#> 1     0  0.2152101
#> 2     1  0.8003496
#> 3     2  0.7149330
#> 4     3 -0.3171712
#> 5     4 -2.2520451
#> 6     5  1.5052482
#> 7     6 -0.4191479
#> 8     7 -0.2081800
#> 9     8  1.0250086
#> 10    9 -2.1093522
#> 11   10  0.5811560
#>
